PLEINGAZ est une marque commerciale came: PLEINGAZ is a Cameroonian commercial brand of domestic gas, distributed by INFOTECH S.A. through its INFOTECHGAZ department. Present on the market since December 2015, PLEINGAZ has established itself as a key player in the energy sector in Cameroon.
Nos produits sont disponibles sur tout l: Our products are available nationwide through a strong and reliable distribution network. Our mission is to make domestic gas accessible to as many people as possible, by ensuring safety, reliability, and permanent availability.
En plus du gaz, PLEINGAZ propose une gam: In addition to gas, PLEINGAZ offers a complete range of accessories: gas stoves, regulators, hoses, burners, and other essential equipment for simple and safe use.
Le produit a reçu un accueil positif au: The product received a positive reception in Cameroon, with launch sales far exceeding forecasts. Since the introduction of PLEINGAZ, households dissatisfied with other brands have been satisfied and continue to trust our brand. This has been possible due to factors such as the reliability, availability, and safety of our cylinders.
